text:
[Verse]
Engine hums so deep
Neon signs that glow
City sleeps we creep
Feel the night unfold

[Verse 2]
Empty streets we roam
Under stars so bright
Lost but found in chrome
Dreams come alive tonight

[Chorus]
Midnight drive we groove
Heartbeats sync in tune
Windows down we lose
Chasing velvet moons

[Verse 3]
Radio plays loud
Echoes in the dark
Melodies unbound
Fire ignites the spark

[Bridge]
Speed through time and space
Miles just fade away
Endless thrill we chase
Here we'll always stay

[Chorus]
Midnight drive we groove
Heartbeats sync in tune
Windows down we lose
Chasing velvet moons
title: Midnight Drive
